welcome.title: Welcome to BuildingAI
welcome.subtitle: Powerful open-source enterprise AI agent platform, quickly start your AI agent journey

admin.title: Administrator account
admin.description: The administrator has the highest privileges and can manage all functions of the system.

website.title: Website Configuration
website.description: Set your website name, logo, and other information to create a unique brand image.

usernamePlaceholder: Please enter a username (3-20 characters, letters, numbers, and underscores only)
passwordPlaceholder: Please enter a password (at least 6 characters)
websiteNameDescription: Will be displayed in the browser tab and website title
websiteLogoDescription: Recommended size: 512x512px, supports JPG and PNG formats
agreementTip: Before launching BuildingAI, please read GitHub's
agreement: I have read and agree to
completeDescription: Your system has been configured and is now ready to use.

validation.usernameLength: The username must be between 3 and 20 characters long.
validation.usernamePattern: The username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
validation.passwordLength: The password must be at least 6 characters long.
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.agreementRequired: Please agree to the privacy policy
